website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Smash Leather is a great throwback sneaker to the classic Puma Smash. It sports similar elements and retains the iconic look of the sneaker. Those who are looking for beaters can consider this shoe as it is affordable, durable, and quite easy to clean. Although a majority of those who purchased say that it fits as expected, there were some who recommend going a size up. Overall, it’s a great versatile everyday sneaker.
pros: The sleek and minimalist style of the Puma Smash Leather is what most users appreciate
Its style brings a certain kind of nostalgia for a lot of loyalists
Most of the users commend the sneakers’ comfortability
Several of those who purchased appreciate how versatile and how easy to style these sneakers are
These sneakers are great for every day and all-day wear said a couple of online consumers
The price is worth it according to several customers
Some online shoppers note that Smash Leather is very easy to clean
One noted that, unlike the other sneakers composed of “smooth” leather, the original form of the sneaker retained its form
cons: Some reviewers point out that these sneakers seemed to be composed of synthetic leather, contrary to what was described on the website
The synthetic upper is thin and does not feel durable, said one online shopper
